aboutText: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer and Competitive Programmer, currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science at The ICFAI University, Jaipur. With a strong foundation in algorithms and problem-solving, I strive to create efficient and scalable solutions.

My journey in competitive programming has led me to achieve significant rankings on platforms like LeetCode and GeeksforGeeks, while my development projects showcase my ability to build real-world applications.
